This week I learned a little SQL to deal with spatial datasets that are unwieldy to work with in #rstats or straight up too big to load into memory. If working with spatial data has ever brought your computer to a crawl, this guide is for you:

i'm completely starstruck, even on zoom. the #rstats tidyverse quite literally changed my life https://t.co/92QKZNY7dy

Just released the "SC2API" package for the R programming language. The package is a wrapper for Blizzard's Starcraft 2 API and is now officially published on CRAN! #rstats

Here is a small vignette demonstrating its use in obtaining MMR distributions:

https://t.co/rJibX66z9s
It became increasingly clear to me why #rstats wins and will keep winning: the community that upholds it is just extraordinary. Not just the developers - it's all of us
